Message:
How many days
has it been since then?

No one ever taught me
to count that high...
How long will I have to wait...?

I’m so thirsty.
And I’m so, so tired...

There’s a voice in my head,
an urgent whisper,

telling me I’ve been abandoned...
That I knew it from the start...

That’s right...
When Master told me to stay, he...
Master is so kind, he wouldn’t...

He wouldn’t abandon me...
would he? Has he?

I waited,
just like you said, Master!

I did everything you wanted!
Even when it was scary,
or awful...! I did it!
